snippet: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, the Nobel Peace laureate kept under house arrest for 15 years by Myanmar's generals, spoke to supporters on Monday, after a resounding triumph in parliamentary by-elections.
abstract: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, the Nobel Peace laureate kept under house arrest for 15 years by Myanmar's generals, spoke to supporters on Monday, after a resounding triumph in parliamentary by-elections.

headline.main: Video of Aung San Suu Kyi's Remarks After Elections in Myanmar
